                                                                           =
                                        : : Sting : :

                    =
                                                    Sting drives in and com=
es to a halt next to Diesel.  He transforms to robot mode.

               =
                                                                       Stin=
g:  They're all quite nice.  What do you guys think?
  ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednes=
day, August 14, 2002 10:32 PM
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  : : Diesel=
 : :

  Diesel pulled up alongside Arrow and transformed to his robot mode.=


  Diesel: Ok, pick a ship, and lets get to the killing!
    ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
    From: Hollywood Narrator 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
    Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 9:17 PM
    Subject: Re: Secret Me=
ssages


    Deemos follows Diesel. Arrow speeds up to a parking lot. He tr=
ansforms to robot mode.

    Arrow: This is my grand opportunity. I made an=
 explosive exit last time...

      ----- Original Message -----
      From=
: LurkerAbyss
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
      Sent: Wednesday, Augus=
t 14, 2002 8:17 PM
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                   =
                                                                           =
                          : : Sting : :

                                  =
                                                                    Sting: =
 Alright, let's head out.

                                                =
           He transforms into a scorpion vehicle.  Basically, a scorpion on=
 wheels.  He follows Diesel and company.
        ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
        From: RoboRick007 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        =
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 2:10 PM
        Subject: Re: Secret Messag=
es


        : : Diesel : :

        Diesel: Great, glad to have you with u=
s.

        He transformes back to truck mode.

        Diesel: Lets contin=
ue on our way!

        He continues to drive on.
          ----- Original =
Message ----- 
          From: LurkerAbyss 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
          Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 1:47 PM
          Subject=
: Re: Secret Messages


                                                   =
                                                                        : :=
 Sting : :

                                                               =
                                   Sting smiles, and nods, acknowledging th=
e offer.

                                                                 =
                                 Sting:  It would be a pleasure to aid you =
all.
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: RoboRick00=
7 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, Aug=
ust 14, 2002 12:43 AM
            Subject: Re: Secret Messages


          =
  : : Diesel : :

            Diesel takes Sting's hand and shakes it. Dies=
el had excepted Sting, he was not a enemie.

            Diesel: I have a p=
roposition for you, Sting. We are on our way to Earth, of the past, through=
 the Transwarp rift. We plan to build a great army. Would you like to join =
us?

            Diesel waited for a reply.
              ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
              From: LurkerAbyss 
              To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
              Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 12:06 AM
      =
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                    =
                                                                           =
               : : Sting : :

                                             =
                                                             Sting nods and=
 then smiles a bit.
                  
                                    =
                                                                 Sting:  It=
's a pleasure to meet you all.

                                           =
                                            He extends his arm and hand out=
 to Diesel, for a handshake.
                ----- Original Message ----- 
=
                From: RoboRick007 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
                Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:58 PM
               =
 Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                : : Diesel : :

           =
     Diesel transforms to his robot mode.

                Diesel: I am Die=
sel.

                He motions to the others.

                Diesel: Th=
is is Arrow and Deemos.
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
               From: LurkerAbyss 
                  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
                  Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:55 PM
            =
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                      =
                                                                           =
          : : Sting : :

                                                  =
                                                   He walks closer, and get=
s ready to speak.

                                                        =
                                               Sting:  Hi.  It's Sting.  Wh=
o are you?
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
              =
      From: RoboRick007 
                    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  =
                  Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:53 PM
                 =
   Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                    : : Diesel : :

     =
               The dark tanker sees as this mysterious bot, Sting, drops do=
wn infront of their convoy. He activates his breaks screeching to a stop.

=
                    Diesel: Who are you, and what do you want?
            =
          ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: LurkerA=
byss 
                      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                   =
   Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:42 PM
                      Subject: R=
e: Secret Messages


                                                      =
           : : Sting : :

                                          A myste=
rious, dark bot just happens to be decending from the sky, up ahead, and la=
nds right in the path of Diesel, Arrow and Deemos.  He waits to see if they=
 will see him and stop...
                        ----- Original Message --=
--- 
                        From: RoboRick007 
                        To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                        Sent: Tuesday, August 13, =
2002 10:31 PM
                        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


      =
                  : : Diesel : :

                        Diesel pulls out,=
 following the others towards their destination.
                          =
----- Original Message ----- 
                          From: Hollywood Nar=
rator 
                          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              =
            Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 9:47 PM
                        =
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                          Arrow transforms=
 into a motorcycle. He whips around on a dime and speeds towards the destin=
ation. Deems transforms into a mechanical vulture and flies along behind...=


                            ----- Original Message -----
                =
            From: RoboRick007
                            To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com
                            Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 2:29 P=
M
                            Subject: Re: Secret Messages


              =
              : : Diesel : :

                            He smiled at his =
friends excitment.

                            Diesel: Alright lets go get=
 our ship. And maybe, just maybe, we get to kill some bots doing it!

     =
                       Diesel transformes to his fuel truck mode.

        =
                    Diesel: Roll out!

                            He drive=
s out and pulls to the side waiting for Arrow to lead the way.
